name: Yepty – Pay Per Click Advertising. Monetize Blog and SkyRocket Income with Relevant Contextual Ads
author: Yepty.com

sections.description:
How cool is that when you cash on every single image and word on your blog!

How do you monetize about 100% of your blog content? Has never been easier! Start working with Yepty right now and watch your cashflow increase.

You’ve got everything you need to make it happen:

  • with In-text ads you monetize your text-content

  • In-Image ads brings you income with every image

  • Slider and Ad-line unostentatiously displays ads to the visitors when they scroll the page

  • Text Ads, Related Tags and Tag-Cloud allow you to increase your clicks and boost your blog earnings

We love your blog visitors.

We are interested in having your visitors come back to your blog and never leave for your competitors. The higher the number of returning visitors of your blog the more you earn.

That’s exactly why the ad formats we offer keep your blog content clean and reader friendly while brining you substantial income through relevant pay per click ads displaying.

All of the ad formats are great-looking and have high CTR

Only relevant Ads

Yepty use the powerful contextual technology to select the ads.
This will guarantee only relevant ad displays on your blog. Your visitors will only see the ads they are interested in and the money it brings will give you a substantial income.

With Yepty Ad Network you are guaranteed to have high per click income and on time payments. Start Now!

And receive your money every 1st and 15th of the month directly to your PayPal account

PHP Version

PHP 5.3 is preferred; PHP 4 is supported.
sections.installation:
For an automatic installation through WordPress:

  1. Go to the ‘Add New’ plugins screen in your WordPress admin area
  2. Search for ‘Yepty’
  3. Click ‘Install Now’ and activate the plugin

For a manual installation via FTP:

  1. Upload the yepty folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in your WordPress admin area

To upload the plugin through WordPress, instead of FTP:

  1. Upload the downloaded zip file on the ‘Add New’ plugins screen (see the ‘Upload’ tab) in your WordPress admin area and activate.
sections.faq:
I have some questions (need help, have an idea), how can I contact you?

Feel free to contact us through our community forum.
